channel.title: Assignments on MIT OpenCourseWare
channel.description: Recent content in Assignments on MIT OpenCourseWare

item.title: Assignments
item.description: Each homework assignment has two parts: Part I of each problem set consists of problems which are either rather routine or for which solutions are available in the back of the book, or in 18.03 Notes and Exercises by Prof. Mattuck. Part II contains more challenging and novel problems. They will help you develop an understanding of the material. [EP] refers to a problem in the course textbook: Edwards, C., and D.
